controls.caption: Angle multiplier L
controls.name: angleMultiplier
controls.description: Actual angle ψ is L*φ, where φ is the value in the source array "φ" and L is this value. So, result cartesian coordinates are calculated as x=r*cos(Lφ), y=r*sin(Lφ).

items.caption: π/180 (φ is an angle in degrees)
